# tf.math.digamma

Computes Psi, the derivative of Lgamma (the log of the absolute value of

`Gamma(x)`), element-wise.

* <b>`x`</b>: A `Tensor`. Must be one of the following types: `bfloat16`, `half`, `float32`, `float64`.
